select count(*) from app_process ap join approval a using(approval_no)
ap.user_no = #{userNo}
ap.user_no in ( select user_no from member where department = #{department} )
and process_order <= current_order + 1 and approval_status in ('대기', '진행중')
and process_order = current_order + 1 and approval_status in ('대기', '진행중')
and process_order <= current_order + 1 and approval_status in ('승인', '반려')
and approval_role != '참조'
and approval_role = '참조' and approval_status != '임시저장'
and bookmark = 'Y' and approval_status != '임시저장'
and a.status = 'Y'

select approval_no , user_name , form , title , ( select origin_name from attachment where approval_no = ref_no and category_no = 1 and rownum = 1 ) origin_name , approval_status , current_order , final_order , create_date , complete_date , complete_no , bookmark from app_process ap join approval a using(approval_no) join member m on (a.user_no = m.user_no)
ap.user_no = #{userNo}
ap.user_no in ( select user_no from member where department = #{department} )
and process_order <= current_order + 1 and approval_status in ('대기', '진행중')
and process_order = current_order + 1 and approval_status in ('대기', '진행중')
and approval_role != '참조'
and approval_role = '참조' and approval_status != '임시저장'
and bookmark = 'Y' and approval_status != '임시저장'
and a.status = 'Y' order by approval_no desc

select approval_no , user_name , form , title , ( select origin_name from attachment where approval_no = ref_no and category_no = 1 and rownum = 1 ) origin_name , approval_status , current_order , final_order , create_date , complete_date , complete_no , bookmark from app_process ap join approval a using(approval_no) join member m on (a.user_no = m.user_no)
ap.user_no = #{userNo} and approval_role != '참조'
ap.user_no in ( select user_no from member where department = #{department} )
and approval_status in ('승인', '반려') and process_order <= current_order + 1 and a.status = 'Y' order by complete_date desc, complete_no desc
select count(*) from approval where user_no = #{userNo} and approval_status = '임시저장' and status = 'Y'

select approval_no , user_name , form , title , ( select origin_name from attachment where approval_no = ref_no and category_no = 1 and rownum = 1 ) origin_name , approval_status , create_date from approval a join member using(user_no) where user_no = #{userNo} and approval_status = '임시저장' and a.status = 'Y' order by approval_no desc

select count(*) from approval
status = 'Y'
status = 'N'
and approval_status != '임시저장'

select approval_no , department_name , user_name , form , title , ( select origin_name from attachment where approval_no = ref_no and category_no = 1 and rownum = 1 ) origin_name , approval_status , current_order , final_order , create_date , complete_date , complete_no from approval a join member m using(user_no) join dept d on (m.department = d.department_no)
a.status = 'Y'
a.status = 'N'
and approval_status != '임시저장' order by approval_no desc

update approval set status = 'N' where approval_no in
#{no}

update approval set status = 'Y' where approval_no in
#{no}
mapper.select:
select approval_no app_no , complete_no , am.user_no , am.user_name , md.department_name , mp.position_name , form , title , to_char(to_date(create_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date , to_char(to_date(complete_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') complete_date , current_order , final_order , approval_status
, form_no , effective_date , fd.department_name form_dep_name , content
, pm.user_name pro_user_name , pd.department_name pro_department_name , pp.position_name pro_position_name , process_order , approval_role , p.status pro_status , to_char(to_date(approval_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') approval_date , bookmark pro_bookmark
, attachment_no , origin_name at_origin_name , change_name
from approval a
join member am on (a.user_no = am.user_no) join dept md on (am.department = md.department_no) join position mp on (am.position = mp.position_no)
join form_draft f using(approval_no) join dept fd on (f.department_no = fd.department_no)
left join app_process p using(approval_no) join member pm on (p.user_no = pm.user_no) join dept pd on (pm.department = pd.department_no) join position pp on (pm.position = pp.position_no)
left join attachment on (category_no = 1 and approval_no = ref_no)
where approval_no = #{approvalNo} order by process_order

select approval_no app_no , complete_no , am.user_no , am.user_name , md.department_name , mp.position_name , form , title , to_char(to_date(create_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date , to_char(to_date(complete_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') complete_date , current_order , final_order , approval_status
, form_no , effective_date , f.user_name form_user_name , f.department_name form_dept_name , current_position , promote_position , remark
, pm.user_name pro_user_name , pd.department_name pro_department_name , pp.position_name pro_position_name , process_order , approval_role , p.status pro_status , to_char(to_date(approval_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') approval_date , bookmark pro_bookmark
, attachment_no , origin_name at_origin_name , change_name
from approval a
join member am on (a.user_no = am.user_no) join dept md on (am.department = md.department_no) join position mp on (am.position = mp.position_no)
left join form_transfer f using(approval_no)
left join app_process p using(approval_no) join member pm on (p.user_no = pm.user_no) join dept pd on (pm.department = pd.department_no) join position pp on (pm.position = pp.position_no)
left join attachment on (category_no = 1 and approval_no = ref_no)
where approval_no = #{approvalNo} order by form_no, process_order

select approval_no app_no , complete_no , am.user_no , am.user_name , md.department_name , mp.position_name , form , title , to_char(to_date(create_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date , to_char(to_date(complete_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') complete_date , current_order , final_order , approval_status
, form_no , name , reason , unit , count , price
, pm.user_name pro_user_name , pd.department_name pro_department_name , pp.position_name pro_position_name , process_order , approval_role , p.status pro_status , to_char(to_date(approval_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') approval_date , bookmark pro_bookmark
, attachment_no , origin_name at_origin_name , change_name
from approval a
join member am on (a.user_no = am.user_no) join dept md on (am.department = md.department_no) join position mp on (am.position = mp.position_no)
left join form_consume f using(approval_no)
left join app_process p using(approval_no) join member pm on (p.user_no = pm.user_no) join dept pd on (pm.department = pd.department_no) join position pp on (pm.position = pp.position_no)
left join attachment on (category_no = 1 and approval_no = ref_no)
where approval_no = #{approvalNo} order by form_no, process_order

select approval_no app_no , complete_no , am.user_no , am.user_name , md.department_name , mp.position_name , form , title , to_char(to_date(create_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date , to_char(to_date(complete_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') complete_date , current_order , final_order , approval_status
, form_no , account , user_history , price
, pm.user_name pro_user_name , pd.department_name pro_department_name , pp.position_name pro_position_name , process_order , approval_role , p.status pro_status , to_char(to_date(approval_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') approval_date , bookmark pro_bookmark
, attachment_no , origin_name at_origin_name , change_name
from approval a
join member am on (a.user_no = am.user_no) join dept md on (am.department = md.department_no) join position mp on (am.position = mp.position_no)
left join form_cash f using(approval_no)
left join app_process p using(approval_no) join member pm on (p.user_no = pm.user_no) join dept pd on (pm.department = pd.department_no) join position pp on (pm.position = pp.position_no)
left join attachment on (category_no = 1 and approval_no = ref_no)
where approval_no = #{approvalNo} order by form_no, process_order

select change_no , user_name , department_name , position_name , content , to_char(to_date(create_date, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') create_date , role from app_change ac join member using(user_no) join dept on (department = department_no) join position on (position = position_no) where approval_no = #{approvalNo} and ac.status = 'Y' order by change_no
mapper.update:
update approval
approval_status = '반려' , complete_date = sysdate , complete_no = 'PPIC-230302-' || lpad(seq_cono.nextval, 5, '0')
current_order = current_order + 1 , approval_status = '승인' , complete_date = sysdate , complete_no = 'PPIC-' || to_char(sysdate, 'YYMMDD') || '-' || lpad(seq_cono.nextval, 5, '0')
current_order = current_order + 1 , approval_status = '진행중'
current_order = current_order + 1
where approval_no = #{approvalNo}
mapper.insert: insert into attachment ( attachment_no , origin_name , change_name , category_no , ref_no ) values ( seq_atno.nextval , #{originName} , #{changeName} , 1 , seq_apno.currval )

insert into form_draft ( form_no , approval_no , effective_date , department_no , content ) values ( seq_fono.nextval , seq_apno.currval , #{effectiveDate} , ( select department_no from dept where department_name = #{departmentNo} ) , #{content} )
insert into form_cash ( form_no , approval_no , account , user_history , price ) values ( seq_fono.nextval , seq_apno.currval , #{account} , #{userHistory} , #{price} )
